name: honeyjs
description: An open source Javascript HoneyPot library

scripts.build-cov: echo '!!BUILDING COV FILES ...' && istanbul instrument honey.js > test/honey.cov.js && istanbul instrument honey.min.js > test/honey.min.cov.js && echo '!!DONE'
scripts.report-cov: echo '!!REPORTING COVERAGE ...' && istanbul report --root coverage lcov && echo '!!DONE'
scripts.run-test: echo '!!RUNNING TESTS ...' && grunt test && rm -f test/honey.cov.js && rm -f test/honey.min.cov.js && echo '!!DONE'
scripts.send-cov: echo '!!SENDING TO COVERALLS ...' && grunt send-cov && rm -f -R coverage && echo '!!DONE'
scripts.test: npm run build-cov && npm run run-test && npm run report-cov
scripts.build: npm run build-cov && npm run run-test && npm run report-cov && npm run send-cov
scripts.build-doc: jsdoc -c jsdoc.json && cp -a -f examples/. doc/ && cp -a -f doc/honeyjs/. doc/ && rm -R -f doc/honeyjs

author: Zudd (Hung Luu)
